channel.title: Reimagine the Internet
channel.description: Reimagine the Internet is a production of the Institute for Digital Public Infrastructure at UMass Amherst, asking scholars, activists, journalists, and artists what is broken on the internet and how to fix it.
channel.author: Ethan Zuckerman
channel.copyright: Copyright Â© 2020 Institute for Digital Public Infrastructure
channel.itunes:title: Reimagine the Internet
channel.itunes:subtitle: An Institute for Digital Public Infrastructure production
